name: The GREATEST Clicker Game of ALL Time
name_original: The GREATEST Clicker Game of ALL Time
description: My original idea was to make some sort of war game where you would create different units by, you know, clicking them. Each would have their strengths and weaknesses. You main goal would be to conquer fortresses but unfortunatly i have not yet achieved this level of skill, so, for now, we have this amazing super "balanced" clicker game. Its horrible, but playable.
